notes_for_developers:
- Use the 'calculation_steps' block as implementation guide.
- Base per-sqft min/max should be editable via CMS.
- Scaffolding tier selection can be auto-suggested when sqft > scaffolding_threshold_sqft or when stories > 1.
- All multipliers should be editable in CMS to adapt to market changes.
- When presenting the estimate to a user, show:
    a) Estimated Range (min - max)
    b) Breakdown of major assumptions (sqft, prep multiplier, finish)
    c) CTA to 'Request Exact Quote' that captures photos and schedule
- Ensure GDPR/PIPEDA-compliant storage and terms checkbox on form.
